name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chat Pin thread & quote reply

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add more utilities for google chat, pin thread and quote reply

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google chat currently has limited features, google chat booster adds pin thread feature, and reply quote feature helps users use google chat more effectively.
